meta.title: Max Sum of Subarray of Size K

steps.description: Initialize: Window of size 3 at [0, 2]. Elements: [2, 5, 3]. Sum = 10.
Slide right: Remove 2 (left), add 7 (right). Elements: [5, 3, 7]. Sum = 15.
Slide right: Remove 5, add 1. Elements: [3, 7, 1]. Sum = 11.
Slide right: Remove 3, add 4. Elements: [7, 1, 4]. Sum = 12.
Slide right: Remove 7, add 6. Elements: [1, 4, 6]. Sum = 11.
Slide right: Remove 1, add 8. Elements: [4, 6, 8]. Sum = 18 (MAX).
Slide right: Remove 4, add 2. Elements: [6, 8, 2]. Sum = 16. Window complete!
